text:
="preserve">Chic McLelland (24 March 1953 – 26 December 2020) was a Scottish football player and manager. He played for Aberdeen, Motherwell, Dundee and Montrose. His playing career lasted from 1973 to 1990. His managing career lasted from 1990 to 1991.
McLelland was born in Glasgow. He died on 26 December 2020 at the age of 63.
